reviews.text: I have stayed at this hotel for the fifth time, and it always feels like home. The location is perfect, right in the city center, making it easy to explore the surrounding area. The staff is incredibly friendly and welcoming, ensuring a pleasant stay every time. The breakfast is delicious and plentiful, offering a great start to the day. The rooms are cozy and comfortable, providing a relaxing atmosphere. I highly recommend this hotel for its excellent service and warm hospitality.
Arrived here after an arduous flight from Cincinnati Ohio, and found the room perfect! It was so relaxing I had no trouble showering and getting a great nights rest!
Very accomodating staff, solid breakfast and quick connection to the airport - definitely recommend!

Hi myself and my wife stead in the
Ratonda centrum hotels .
From the 26th off may to the 31th may 2024
We had a wonderful stay the staff were so nice the hotel room was lovely the breakfast was fabulous
And the location was brilliant if were ever visited Vilnius again I would recommend the ratonda centrum hotel
Thanks very much.
Eric @ annmarie.

Not sure how this hotel is 4 stars. The pillows are huge, they couldnt give me a smaller one, I asked for a blanket and they said they can only give extra sheets...the hotel looks old, rooms are very small. Location is great, but otherwise I would not return to this hotel.
